message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good split!
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a fair deal. How about a 49.75/50.25 split?
I'll compromise, 55-45 is as low as I'm willing to go.
This is my final offer.  It's more than fair considering the time pressure and inflation working against me.
Considering the inflation, you're losing value each round. This is a good deal for you, take it!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer or we both walk away with nothing!
We've gone far enough, 50-50 is more than fair considering the circumstances.
